text: Who’s the winner?

it wasn’t easy to be a mum especially a good one. My mum is a teacher while at the same time she need to take care 4of us during school time and after school . Yes ,im having 4siblings and we all study in the same schools together with my mum,imagine 4 of us rush to my mum office and ask for lunch and meals during our rest time , it was such a mess for her😂  but really thank you mummy for being so patient to us , loving us unconditionally and taking care of us 7-24 for more than 20 years, you are such a great mum who are not just taking care of us physically but mentally too💓 I love you and I hope to win this care package just for you 🧡🧡🧡

I love my mom because she did an amazing job for bringing me to this world. Without her , I might not have what I suppose to had in this life ! Because of her great sacrifice , I am who I am today ! Everyday without fail , she ensure all her kids have good meals and ensure her husband have good meals too as we are a big family , she cooked ,she clean up our house and give is a wonderful house ! And also a family whoa are closed enough ! She herself is not educated so she will not blame us on our studies if we did badly ! But still nevertheless she help us in basic words ! But all her 4 kids done her proud , because 4 kids get good results and always top 10 in class without any guidance from parents or tuition ! She give us the best in our life ! For instance when we are young , we might not be rich but my mum will work and get her pay to buy the things we want ! And also everytime when i was in kindergarten , she will bring me to school and fetch me off from school . A mum like her is hard to find , a lady who love her family and willing to give the best ! She is still the one helping me looking after baby because during my after birth , i almost get onto depression but mummy is the one who sacrifice all her time and sleep to help me look after baby till now . So i think she is really a superwoman who deserve a reward . And what's more she help me throughout pregnancy , after birth and confinement and now still helping me looking after baby everyday and night while i went out to work. Her love to me and baby is unconditional love and same to me i love her like how she love us but 
Words cant describe much but still got to say happy mother day ! So hope to win and surprise her ! @lim_lim23

Thank you for raising me up dear mummy! You have been a selfless hero who give her all for all your children. I have never hear you grumble about how tough life is and how tired you are no matter how many odd job u did. I love all your cooking and I love tt no matter when I ask for a dish, I definitely see it on the dinner table within the next few days. That's the way you showed your love for us, no matter how much you nagged at us. I love you dear mummy.... 😍😍😍

During this circuit breaker period, I developed a greater appreciation for my mum's love and concern for us - cooking delicious meals everyday, making nourishing desserts/herbal tea to keep us nourished or preparing fruit plates to keep us healthy! Not just on Mother's Day, I told her that she is THE BEST randomly throughout this period 😍😍 Grateful to have this superwoman at home to keep us healthy and pui pui AHAHA! love you mum @geokkimlow  and thank you for everything! 💕💕
Very appreciate everything my mum have do in our family! I am proud have a supermum who always care family 1st. Thank you Mum! We love you❤️ @seahmummy

Thank you Mummy @callme_suzie for always thinking of us all the time,from ensuring that we have enough to eat, buying our fave food, making sure we wake up in time for school/work all these years! You really deserve the best:)❤️

My mum’s love is truly one that is unconditional. She acts with compassion and always puts our family first. I still remember the couple of times when I was working part time and got home at 10pm and she had a midnight concall, instead of resting from her long day of work, she would always whip up a meal for me and even prepared my lunch the next day just so I can save extra cash. I always consider myself to be a lucky kid because even up till now, my mum still fixes breakfast for her 3 working children just so we wouldn’t starve before lunch. So thank you mummy for all you’ve done, I hope to pamper you with this package just like how you have pampered us 🥰 here’s a short poem for you:
Marvelling at your immense love for us
One that only cares for our happiness
Too many times I may have taken it for granted, yet your
Heart is filled with kindness
Even when we are difficult to love, you are
Ready to be our wonder woman
@choonggenie

My mum’s given up everything for our family. Flying halfway round the world to have ice cream with me when I couldn’t handle being away from home on exchange, flying across continents to pick up luggage from my second brother when he was on exchange even if it meant excess baggage for them and not even catching a glimpse of him, spending sleepless nights worrying about my youngest brother when he contracted his rare disease that was potentially fatal, giving up her job to take care of dad when he was battling stage four of a rare cancer. Life has dealt us a tough hand but I’ll play the cards in mine and count my forever blessings for a mum like her (: @sinjey

Hope to win for my mother.
I still remember my mum wake up early to prepare our breakfast before we go to school.
Actually she only sleep around 3-5 hours per day.My mother work as part time job at midnight in order to maintain the high expenses in our home .
we all grow up now and she no requests us buy anything for her .She just hope we are healthy and happiness .  @beehong2019

In this World, there will not be another person who will love me and care for me the way you do. You have sacrificed many things in life, including your youth and your time to take care of me and guide me in my life, You are amazing brave mum who will protect me and stand up for me.
Deep in my heart, I know that without you, I would not be where I am today. No matter what age I am , I want to be the one holding your hand, taking care of you and protecting you 😍 Happy Mother's day to my dearest mom 💕
Liked ,Followed and Shared this post 
@nomadxsg
I’m thankful for the unconditional love she has given me. The person whom I know will always be there for me no matter what happens. I love you Mummy ❤️ Tagging @tiffany.limm @desiresxx @cherraexoxo
Thank you for everything mom! @cherrie_tjy

I love my mum because of the many memories that we shared and one of the fondest was when I became a mom myself, I will never forget how she woke up so early every morning just to do marketing for the best freshest ingredients for my 3 meals daily just so that I have a good confinement done. And the patience and love she shown in caring for my baby further motivated me to be a good mom like her! I also wanna let her know that everything she does now have a huge positive impact on my parenting skill and she is definitely my role model! @mrsliow

My mom has always been there for me whenever I needed support. She will help to ensure that my clothing, my meals and everything is in order. Really appreciate her for doing everything without asking for return. She really take care of her skin and meals, so I would really hope to get this. I love you mummy!! Hope to win this care package to pamper you 😍😍 @tannalulu

My mom inspires me through the little things everyday. My mom has dedicated her life to the family. She left her job and chose to stay home to take care of the family after dad left us. She wasn’t good at cooking, but she learned it through youtube, so we can enjoy nutritious homecooked food everyday. She wasn’t good at cleaning, but she always ensure the home is well maintained and clean for us to stay in. She wasn’t good at baking, but she learned it herself, just so she can bake a cake on our birthdays. She never fails to bake a cake on every of our birthdays. She learns activities we like, just so she can communicate and blend in with us. She put in extra effort when things are not second nature to her. 
Her tasks are as endless as the many hats a stay-at-home parent wears: housekeeper, chef, accountant, interior designer, planner, chauffeur, nurse, therapist, playmate, educator, etc.

This journey as a single mother wasn't easy but she made it. She is brave, independent and strong. 
I am grateful to have her shower me with her love and attention. 
I am glad to have her standing by me, even when i am being difficult. 
I am blessed to have her holding my small hands all these while and never once thought of letting it go. 
Thank you for loving me when I am so hard to love. ❤️

My mum is selfless as she gave up her career in order to raise me and my sibling. She quit her job when my brother went to primary school as she wanted to be able to care for him so I would like to express my gratitude for my mum for sacrificing her future in order to ensure we are well-taken of. From being clueless in cooking, she took the time to learn how to cook 3 dishes and one soup and I am so grateful to have her as my mum.

I appreciate my mum for she turns the house into a place full of warmth called home. She is truly an amazing and strong woman for bringing me up and taking care of the household all while pursuing her aspirations of being a tutor. Many sacrifices have gone untold and she remains the same role model that I’d emulate anytime. Positivity it is! She is a wonder woman, my hero! 🤩

Liked followed and shared
I’m lucky to have my mum prepare home cooked meals for us ❤️ Tagging mummy goy @ksiewgek

I appreciate her because she has always been supportive to us. We had a big family of 7 kids and she always look out after each of us, not less for anyone. She is the best superwoman best supermom!!! Hope to win this care package for her so that she can enjoy and pamper herself during this trying period!!! 😍

Not only is she my mother, she is also my role model, my confidant, and one of my best friends. ❤️😍❤️
My mom @jennifercheok has been nothing but wonderful to me, loving me unconditionally, and supporting me in whatever dreams I wanted to pursue! She has also been working tirelessly for the last 30 years and whilst working from home she's got an even bigger workload and is under alot more stress!!🤯🤯
That's why I would really love to surprise her with a care package, to show her just how much she means to me, and I can't wait to spoil her silly on this special day ❤️❤️

Mummy! @gfong7 Thanks for loving me for who I am!  I wished I could repay you for all that you have done but I won’t be able to!!! Instead hope to love you deeply for the rest of the time and to bring you on wonderful trips and makan sessions!

Without my mum, there is no me. Without my mum, I won't be a mum. without my mum, I won't have 4 kids of my own. Without my mum, I won't be a better mum. Thank you mum for everything and more. 
When I was young, my mum stopped working so that she can care for me and my mother. She ensured that we were sent to school and fetch home on time, prepared home cooked food for us and gave us an environment where we can grow, study and be successful adults. It was 20 odd years of sacrifice. After I got married and have children of my own, she continue to help me take care of my children. Thanks to her and her never ending support and help, I went on to have 4 children of my own. She has been selfless as a mother and now as a grandmother. She helps me with my household so that i can go to work with a peace of mind. She is the nanny, housekeeper, teacher, chef all roll in 1. I am forever indebted to her for her selflessness in the past and now.

The small acts of great love is displayed by my mum everyday, where she stays up late just to make sure we are all safely home, or when she drive us around so that we can live our lives 🙌🙌🙌 superwoman ftw 💯💯

Being a mom is the most underpaid job in the world. They get no day offs, no pay and at times even receive criticism from us. But yet they still go through this because of their love for us.

Mother’s Day should not be just a day but something we do all year round. We love you and all that you have done for us @geezywing @literallydevice

Mummy dearest, thank you for all that you do for the family. You hold a full time job yet make it home in time every day to cook dinner for us pre-CB, cook dinner during CB, and also cook both lunch and dinner on weekends. You run the household efficiently and ensure that the house is clean, everyone’s schedules are adhered to and take care of us when we are sick. All these are done on your own without any domestic help. You are truly an inspiration and my superhero! @applegsy

In the past year, i met with several rough patches and i got through only with my mum’s support and listening ear. However, i know that my problems and the emotional support that i ask of her has caused her to feel stressed and strained. Her constant worrying for me over the past year has caused her to aged and I feel guilty for that. This mother’s day i hope to surprise her with a gift to express my gratitude and appreciation for her. ❤️ tagging my mummy here! @aivytor

Liked, Followed & Shared❣️Thanks For The Giveaway ❤️ Tagging All My Mummy Friends 😍 All Mummies, Whether Working Or Stay Home Mums, 你们辛苦了🙆🏻‍♀️ @yihui_lee @meixia315 @naililwjz @pp.bai @t_tricia @chloehlim @jenll @jen_luvv @feliciagyh @huixian17
Thank u ma @eunice_tan1  for being u. U gave ur best to me and taking care of the fam gramps sis n me and this is more than I ever need. Love u💗!!!

Mums the best! During the cb period, mum has kindly stocked the fridge and pantry up with food so that us kids won’t be hangry during the day from working from home! Also bcuz she’s an essential worker she will have to keep herself away from us during this period. Courageous 💓

Can’t wait to pamper my mum @wong.ah.wan with this 😍

My mum is special because of her unconventional way of loving me. During my university days, when I am always studying late at night till 2-3am, she will “scold” me for studying till the wee hours. No matter is it primary school, secondary school, junior college or when choosing university courses, she always make sure she’s there to “nag” at me and “challenge” my choices. Now that I’m married, she’s still there to “complain” about the food i cook and how i manage household matters. 
But i know deep down in her heart, she love me for who I am. She’s my lifelong mentor. No matter what time it is or how busy she is, I can count on her to be there for me. I’m very fortunate that I can always turn to her and there was never a time where I felt that I'm alone. I'm grateful for her and I appreciate the role she play in my life ❤️ she show me her capacity of loving someone in a way I never would have imagined, she show me how big her heart would get, she show me that being a mum is the best job in the world and she wouldn't want it any other way ❤️ My mum is the best, she’s my biggest supporter and always have my best interest at heart.

Liked and shared to story!!!

Dear mummy, thank you for everything you have done for me and devoting your life in bring us up without any complaints. I remember once asking you why others had their grandparents while all I have is you. You told me it is because you loves me too much. It was so heartwarming. @fifian_pacific

Dear mummy, thank you for everything you have done for me and devoting your life in bring us up without any complaints. I remember once asking you why others had their grandparents while all I have is you. You told me it is because you loves me too much. It was so heartwarming. @foreveryunyun

Happy mumma’s day to my fellow mummas! Can’t mention just one. Wishing you all have a nice one to be celebrated with our loved ones. Cheers to more and everyday mothers days! @leelynmay @myhappytots_ @rejah @ashlie02

Darling Mummy, thank you for all your quiet sacrifices, selfless love and unwavering support. You are a person of few words and express care and concern for the family through actions. We love you very much and you have been and will always be my inspiration. Happy Mother’s Day ❤️ @kite23prom
Happy mother's day to my mummy! Thanks for doing everything for the family while juggling work! That is definitely not easy at all! 💖

My mum is always my hero who keeps encouraging me to stay brave, happy and positive throughout my difficult life with my bring hearing impairment since I lost both my hearings due to high fever. She took the sign language course for my sake that we could communicate each other and it made me feel there is no difference between being hearing impaired and normal life in the world. I'm so grateful to her for who I am now. I am a mother of my two lovely boys. Appreciate for her great effort on me since I was born. Mum, I love you!
I appreciate that my mum has spent her younger years bringing up 3 children while helping my dad out in his business, with the expense of her health and youth ❤️
I appreciate that my mum has shown me unconditional love while taking care of me during the recovery from a serious accident many years back!! 🥰👩‍❤️‍👩🌟💫

My mom has superpowers...my mom has the power of eyes in the back of her head. Her famous lines: "Don't even think about it." "I see you." Only eyes in the back of her head could explain how she knew that it was me who broke her vase. 
My mom has the power to read minds. She would say: "It looks like you had a bad day, want to talk about it?" " I think you need some ice cream, let's just you and me go get some."
My mom has superpowers. She is an extraordinary woman with extraordinary love. She shared that love with me so that I, too, can be extraordinary.
The good news is now I'm a mom. And wouldn't you know it...I can feel them sprouting, even as we speak...eyes on the back of my head!
I love you my Mom, Ummi!!! 💝💝💝
@_nsssknhhhh
I appreciate my mum because shes the superwoman in the family! always putting everyone else before herself l, making sure we are all well fed and keeping the house spick and span! thank you mummy!❤️

My mum is the most inspirational because she can give up her favourite food for me! E.g. at Tze Char dinner we'll both be picking for the same dish which only has 1 piece left, but she always say it's okay and that I can have it. This time I hope to pamper her with a care package which she truly deserves 🙌🙌🙌 @hollymolly56
Appreciation to Mum for everything she has done for throughout the years. @applekkb
Motherhood is constantly reflective. It's both the greatest challenge and the greatest joy of my life.  @sandragohpc1

I would like to win this care package because Mother’s Day is coming soon and this will be the best gift for her. 👩‍👧🎁 My beloved woman, my strong woman, my wonder woman, my teacher. She taught me to do my best because no matter what the outcome was as long as I did my best I could be proud of myself. And she’s always be everything for me. So how much I love you mummy! No matter how many times we argue, how many times I don’t understand you. I still think that you are the best and will always be the greatest mum in the whole wide world! I don’t tell you this often enough, but I really love you. You’re such an important person in my life and I appreciate all that you do for me. Thank you @nomadxsg for hosting this awesome giveaway! @ky_2885
🦸‍♀️Regardless of your situation, you are our superwomen. Thank you for being the most awesome mummy in the world! ✨ @queklaylian
